summary: A young woman arrives at the home of her socialite cousin, and soon finds herself sucked into the woman's complex web of deceit.
cast: Joan Crawford|Barry Sullivan|Betsy Palmer|John Ireland|Lucy Marlow|William Leslie|Fay Wray|Katherine Anderson|Tim Hovey|Linda Bennett|Willa Pearl Curtis|Robert McCord|Olan Soule|Bill Walker
title: La abeja reina
